This barrier is designed to prevent anyone from leaving its confines. Once within a certain range of the target, the user erects the barrier underfoot, rendering anyone within the seal formula incapable of escaping. Despite its strength, it can be overpowered as demonstrated when [[Naruto Uzumaki]] was able to easily break the seal by entering his [[Nine-Tails Chakra Mode]].

In the anime, it was shown that several people can combine their efforts to increase the strength of the technique.<ref>''Boruto'' episode 37</ref>

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm Revolution]]'', this technique is incorrectly called {{translation|"Barrier Method Formation"|結界法陣|Kekkai Hōjin}}, sharing name with an already [[Barrier Method Formation|named technique]]. It causes an explosion if the opponent is caught up in it, and explodes on its own after a while if no opponent triggers it.
